title.narrative: Providing and distributing food baskets for Rohingya refugees in Bangladesh.

description.narrative: 14,905 food parcels were provided to families for a period of 30 days before the holy month of Ramadan. 59,620 beneficiaries benefited - Securing and transporting 14,905 food parcels, weighing 24 kilos, to all the following governorates: Chittagong Province - Rangonia, Sand Ging Comilla County - Brahman Paraya, Titas Siraj Ganj Province - Borad certificates Port Narain Ganj District - Shimultuli Nilfimari Prefecture - Geldaka Rohingya refugee camps in Cox's Bazar. - Reducing the financial burden of providing food for displaced and refugee families from wars and hunger. Spending household savings on other matters, such as education and health.

Fulfilling the need, poverty and adequacy of the poor, especially in areas of displacement and peripheral areas Poverty alleviation and the suffering of refugee families for more than 59,620 beneficiaries. Contributing to the financial burden of the poorest families.
